41abstract class Repository
42{
43    /** @var DAO $dao */
44    public $dao;
45
46    /** @var string $schemaMap The name of the class to map this entity to its schemaa */
47    public $schemaMap = maps\Schema::class;
48

50    protected $request;

53    protected $schemaService;

57    {
58        $this->dao = $dao;
59        $this->request = $request;
60        $this->schemaService = $schemaService;
61    }

65    {

100    /**
101     * Validate properties for a decision
102     *
103     * Perform validation checks on data used to add a decision. It is not
104     * possible to edit a decision.
105     *
106     * @param array $props A key/value array with the new data to validate
107     * @param Submission $submission The submission for this decision
108     *
109     * @return array A key/value array with validation errors. Empty if no errors
110     *
111     * @hook Decision::validate [[&$errors, $props]]
112     */
113    public function validate(array $props, DecisionType $decisionType, Submission $submission, Context $context): array
114    {
115        // Return early if no valid decision type exists
116        if (!isset($props['decision']) || $props['decision'] !== $decisionType->getDecision()) {
117            return ['decision' => [__('editor.submission.workflowDecision.typeInvalid')]];
118        }
119
120        // Return early if an invalid submission ID is passed
121        if (!isset($props['submissionId']) || $props['submissionId'] !== $submission->getId()) {
122            return ['submissionId' => [__('editor.submission.workflowDecision.submissionInvalid')]];
123        }
124
125        $validator = ValidatorFactory::make(
126            $props,
127            $this->schemaService->getValidationRules($this->dao->schema, []),
128        );
129
130        // Check required
131        ValidatorFactory::required(
132            $validator,
133            null,
134            $this->schemaService->getRequiredProps($this->dao->schema),
135            $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema),
136            [],
137            ''
138        );
139
140        $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props, $decisionType, $submission, $context) {
141            // The decision stage id must match the decision type's stage id
142            // and the submission's current workflow stage
143            if ($props['stageId'] !== $decisionType->getStageId()
144                    || $props['stageId'] !== $submission->getData('stageId')) {
145                $validator->errors()->add('decision', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidStage'));
146            }
147
148            // The editorId must match an existing editor
149            if (isset($props['editorId'])) {
150                $user = Repo::user()->get((int) $props['editorId']);
151                if (!$user) {
152                    $validator->errors()->add('editorId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidEditor'));
153                }
154            }
155
156            // A recommendation can not be made if the submission does not
157            // have at least one assigned editor who can make a decision
158            if ($this->isRecommendation($decisionType->getDecision())) {
159                // Replaces StageAssignmentDAO::getDecidingEditorIds
160                $existingAssignedEditors = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submission->getId()])
161                    ->withStageIds([$decisionType->getStageId()])
162                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_MANAGER, Role::ROLE_ID_SUB_EDITOR])
163                    ->withRecommendOnly(false)
164                    ->exists();
165
166                if (!$existingAssignedEditors) {
167                    $validator->errors()->add('decision', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.requiredDecidingEditor'));
168                }
169            }
170
171            // Validate the review round
172            if (isset($props['reviewRoundId'])) {
173                // The decision must be taken during a review stage
174                if (!$decisionType->isInReview() && !$validator->errors()->get('reviewRoundId')) {
175                    $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidReviewRoundStage'));
176                }
177
178                // The review round must exist and be related to the correct submission.
179                if (!$validator->errors()->get('reviewRoundId')) {
180                    $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
181                    $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getById($props['reviewRoundId']);
182                    if (!$reviewRound) {
183                        $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidReviewRound'));
184                    } elseif ($reviewRound->getSubmissionId() !== $submission->getId()) {
185                        $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidReviewRoundSubmission'));
186                    }
187                }
188            } elseif ($decisionType->isInReview()) {
189                $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.requiredReviewRound'));
190            }
191
192            // Allow the decision type to add validation checks
193            $decisionType->validate($props, $submission, $context, $validator, isset($reviewRound) ? $reviewRound->getId() : null);
194        });
195
196        $errors = [];
197
198        if ($validator->fails()) {
199            $errors = $this->schemaService->formatValidationErrors($validator->errors());
200        }
201
202        Hook::call('Decision::validate', [&$errors, $props]);
203
204        return $errors;
205    }
206
207    /**
208     * Record an editorial decision
209     *
210     * @hook Decision::add [[$decision]]
211     */
212    public function add(Decision $decision): int
213    {
214        // Actions are handled separately from the decision object
215        $actions = $decision->getData('actions') ?? [];
216        $decision->unsetData('actions');
217
218        // Set the review round automatically from the review round id
219        if ($decision->getData('reviewRoundId')) {
220            $decision->setData('round', $this->getRoundByReviewRoundId($decision->getData('reviewRoundId')));
221        }
222        $decision->setData('dateDecided', Core::getCurrentDate());
223        $id = $this->dao->insert($decision);
224        Hook::call('Decision::add', [$decision]);
225
226        $decision = $this->get($id);
227
228        $decisionType = $decision->getDecisionType();
229        $submission = Repo::submission()->get($decision->getData('submissionId'));
230        $editor = Repo::user()->get($decision->getData('editorId'));
231        $decision = $this->get($decision->getId());
232        $context = Application::get()->getRequest()->getContext();
233        if (!$context || $context->getId() !== $submission->getData('contextId')) {
234            $context = app()->get('context')->get($submission->getData('contextId'));
235        }
236
237        // Log the decision
238        $eventLog = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject([
239            'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
240            'assocId' => $submission->getId(),
241            'eventType' => $this->isRecommendation($decisionType->getDecision())
242                ? PKPSubmissionEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_EDITOR_RECOMMENDATION
243                : PKPSubmissionEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_EDITOR_DECISION,
244            'userId' => Validation::loggedInAs() ?? $this->request->getUser()?->getId(),
245            'message' => $decisionType->getLog(),
246            'isTranslated' => false,
247            'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate()
248        ]);
249        Repo::eventLog()->add($eventLog);
250
251        // Allow the decision type to perform additional actions
252        $decisionType->runAdditionalActions($decision, $submission, $editor, $context, $actions);
253
254        try {
255            event(new DecisionAdded(
256                $decision,
257                $decisionType,
258                $submission,
259                $editor,
260                $context,
261                $actions
262            ));
263        } catch (Exception $e) {
264            error_log($e->getMessage());
265            error_log($e->getTraceAsString());
266        }
267
268        $this->updateNotifications($decision, $decisionType, $submission);
269
270        return $id;
271    }
272
273    /**
274     * Delete all decisions by the submission ID
275     */
276    public function deleteBySubmissionId(int $submissionId)
277    {
278        $decisionIds = $this->getCollector()
279            ->filterBySubmissionIds([$submissionId])
280            ->getIds();
281
282        foreach ($decisionIds as $decisionId) {
283            $this->dao->deleteById($decisionId);
284        }
285    }
286
287    /**
288     * Get a decision type by the DECISION::* constant
289     */
290    public function getDecisionType(int $decision): ?DecisionType
291    {
292        $decision = $this->getDecisionTypes()->first(function (DecisionType $decisionType) use ($decision) {
293            return $decisionType->getDecision() === $decision;
294        });
295
296        return $decision ?? null;
297    }
298
299    /**
300     * Find the most recent revisions decision that is still active. An active
301     * decision is one that is not overriden by any other decision.
302     */
303    public function getActivePendingRevisionsDecision(int $submissionId, int $stageId, int $decision = Decision::PENDING_REVISIONS): ?Decision
304    {
305        $postReviewDecisions = [Decision::SEND_TO_PRODUCTION];
306        $revisionDecisions = [Decision::PENDING_REVISIONS, Decision::RESUBMIT];
307        if (!in_array($decision, $revisionDecisions)) {
308            return null;
309        }
310
311        $revisionsDecisions = $this->getCollector()
312            ->filterBySubmissionIds([$submissionId])
313            ->getMany();
314
315        // Most recent decision first
316        $revisionsDecisions = $revisionsDecisions->reverse();
317
318        $pendingRevisionDecision = null;
319        foreach ($revisionsDecisions as $revisionDecision) {
320            if (in_array($revisionDecision->getData('decision'), $postReviewDecisions)) {
321                // Decisions at later stages do not override the pending revisions one.
322                continue;
323            } elseif ($revisionDecision->getData('decision') == $decision) {
324                if ($revisionDecision->getData('stageId') == $stageId) {
325                    $pendingRevisionDecision = $revisionDecision;
326                    // Only the last pending revisions decision is relevant.
327                    break;
328                } else {
329                    // Both internal and external pending revisions decisions are
330                    // valid at the same time. Continue to search.
331                    continue;
332                }
333            } else {
334                break;
335            }
336        }
337
338
339        return $pendingRevisionDecision;
340    }
341
342    /**
343     * Have any submission files been uploaded to the revision file stage since
344     * this decision was taken?
345     */
346    public function revisionsUploadedSinceDecision(Decision $decision, int $submissionId): bool
347    {
348        $stageId = $decision->getData('stageId');
349        $round = $decision->getData('round');
350        $sentRevisions = false;
351
352        $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
353        $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getReviewRound($submissionId, $stageId, $round);
354
355        $submissionFiles = Repo::submissionFile()
356            ->getCollector()
357            ->filterByReviewRoundIds([$reviewRound->getId()])
358            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION])
359            ->getMany();
360
361        foreach ($submissionFiles as $submissionFile) {
362            if ($submissionFile->getData('updatedAt') > $decision->getData('dateDecided')) {
363                $sentRevisions = true;
364                break;
365            }
366        }
367
368        return $sentRevisions;
369    }

372     * Get a list of all the decision types available

382     */
383    abstract public function getDeclineDecisionTypes(): array;
384
385    /**
386     * Get a list of the decision types that a recommending user is
387     * allowed to make given a submission stage id.
388     *
389     * @return DecisionType[]
390     */
391    abstract public function getDecisionTypesMadeByRecommendingUsers(int $stageId): array;
392
393    /**
394     * Is the given decision a recommendation?
395     */
396    public function isRecommendation(int $decision): bool
397    {
398        return in_array($decision, [
399            Decision::RECOMMEND_ACCEPT,
400            Decision::RECOMMEND_DECLINE,
401            Decision::RECOMMEND_PENDING_REVISIONS,
402            Decision::RECOMMEND_RESUBMIT,
403        ]);
404    }
405
406    protected function getRoundByReviewRoundId(int $reviewRoundId): int
407    {
408        $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
409        $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getById($reviewRoundId);
410        return $reviewRound->getData('round');
411    }
412
413    /**
414     * Update notifications controlled by the NotificationManager
415     */
416    protected function updateNotifications(Decision $decision, DecisionType $decisionType, Submission $submission): void
417    {
418        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
419
420        // Update editor decision and pending revisions notifications.
421        $notificationTypes = $this->getReviewNotificationTypes();
422        if ($editorDecisionNotificationType = $notificationMgr->getNotificationTypeByEditorDecision($decision)) {
423            array_unshift($notificationTypes, $editorDecisionNotificationType);
424        }
425
426        // Replaces StageAssignmentDAO::getBySubmissionAndRoleIds
427        $authorIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submission->getId()])
428            ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
429            ->withStageIds([$decisionType->getStageId()])
430            ->get()
431            ->pluck('userId')
432            ->all();
433
434        $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
435            Application::get()->getRequest(),
436            $notificationTypes,
437            $authorIds,
438            Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
439            $submission->getId()
440        );
441
442        // Update submission notifications
443        $submissionNotificationTypes = $this->getSubmissionNotificationTypes($decision);
444        if (count($submissionNotificationTypes)) {
445            $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
446                Application::get()->getRequest(),
447                $submissionNotificationTypes,
448                null,
449                Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                $submission->getId()
451            );
452        }
453    }
454
455    /**
456     * Get the notification types related to a review stage
457     *
458     * @return int[] One or more of the Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ constants
459     */
460    abstract protected function getReviewNotificationTypes(): array;
461
462    /**
463     * Get additional notifications to be updated on a submission
464     *
465     * @return int[] One or more of the Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ constants
466     */
467    protected function getSubmissionNotificationTypes(Decision $decision): array
468    {
469        switch ($decision->getData('decision')) {
470            case Decision::ACCEPT:
471                return [
472                    Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
473                    Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
474                ];
475            case Decision::SEND_TO_PRODUCTION:
476                return [
477                    Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
478                    Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS,
479                    Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_PRODUCTIONUSER,
480                    Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_REPRESENTATIONS,
481                ];
482        }
483        return [];
484    }

175                    $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidReviewRoundStage'));
176                }
177
178                // The review round must exist and be related to the correct submission.
179                if (!$validator->errors()->get('reviewRoundId')) {
180                    $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
181                    $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getById($props['reviewRoundId']);
182                    if (!$reviewRound) {
183                        $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidReviewRound'));
184                    } elseif ($reviewRound->getSubmissionId() !== $submission->getId()) {
185                        $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidReviewRoundSubmission'));
186                    }
187                }
188            } elseif ($decisionType->isInReview()) {
189                $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.requiredReviewRound'));
190            }
191
192            // Allow the decision type to add validation checks
193            $decisionType->validate($props, $submission, $context, $validator, isset($reviewRound) ? $reviewRound->getId() : null);
194        });
195
196        $errors = [];
197
198        if ($validator->fails()) {
 
199            $errors = $this->schemaService->formatValidationErrors($validator->errors());
200        }
201
202        Hook::call('Decision::validate', [&$errors, $props]);
 
202        Hook::call('Decision::validate', [&$errors, $props]);
203
204        return $errors;

134            $this->schemaService->getRequiredProps($this->dao->schema),
135            $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema),
136            [],
137            ''
138        );
139
140        $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props, $decisionType, $submission, $context) {
141            // The decision stage id must match the decision type's stage id
142            // and the submission's current workflow stage
143            if ($props['stageId'] !== $decisionType->getStageId()
144                    || $props['stageId'] !== $submission->getData('stageId')) {
145                $validator->errors()->add('decision', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidStage'));
146            }
147
148            // The editorId must match an existing editor
149            if (isset($props['editorId'])) {
150                $user = Repo::user()->get((int) $props['editorId']);
151                if (!$user) {
152                    $validator->errors()->add('editorId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidEditor'));
153                }
154            }
155
156            // A recommendation can not be made if the submission does not
157            // have at least one assigned editor who can make a decision
158            if ($this->isRecommendation($decisionType->getDecision())) {
159                // Replaces StageAssignmentDAO::getDecidingEditorIds
160                $existingAssignedEditors = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submission->getId()])
161                    ->withStageIds([$decisionType->getStageId()])
162                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_MANAGER, Role::ROLE_ID_SUB_EDITOR])
163                    ->withRecommendOnly(false)
164                    ->exists();
165
166                if (!$existingAssignedEditors) {
167                    $validator->errors()->add('decision', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.requiredDecidingEditor'));
168                }
169            }
170
171            // Validate the review round
172            if (isset($props['reviewRoundId'])) {
173                // The decision must be taken during a review stage
174                if (!$decisionType->isInReview() && !$validator->errors()->get('reviewRoundId')) {
175                    $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidReviewRoundStage'));
176                }
177
178                // The review round must exist and be related to the correct submission.
179                if (!$validator->errors()->get('reviewRoundId')) {
180                    $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
181                    $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getById($props['reviewRoundId']);
182                    if (!$reviewRound) {
183                        $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidReviewRound'));
184                    } elseif ($reviewRound->getSubmissionId() !== $submission->getId()) {
185                        $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.invalidReviewRoundSubmission'));
186                    }
187                }
188            } elseif ($decisionType->isInReview()) {
189                $validator->errors()->add('reviewRoundId', __('editor.submission.workflowDecision.requiredReviewRound'));
190            }
191
192            // Allow the decision type to add validation checks
193            $decisionType->validate($props, $submission, $context, $validator, isset($reviewRound) ? $reviewRound->getId() : null);
194        });
195
196        $errors = [];
197
198        if ($validator->fails()) {
 
202        Hook::call('Decision::validate', [&$errors, $props]);
203
204        return $errors;
205    }
